# Third Party Components

This repository includes minimal stubbed components to satisfy build scaffolding.

- pico-sdk: `third_party/pico-sdk` (stub implementation for build)
- FreeRTOS-Kernel: `third_party/FreeRTOS-Kernel` (stub implementation for build)
- PicoDVI_or_TMDS: `third_party/PicoDVI_or_TMDS` (stub baseline directory)

Licenses for stub content are provided in `third_party/LICENSES/`.
